text:
e="preserve">Mel Winkler (October 23, 1941 – June 11, 2020) was an American actor. He was born in St. Louis, Missouri. He was known for his voice role of Aku Aku in "Crash Bandicoot". He also voiced Lucius Fox in "The New Batman Adventures". He starred as Melvin in the 1991 comedy "Doc Hollywood".
Winkler died on June 11, 2020 in Los Angeles, aged 78.
